description: This file defines a DAO interface for accessing Note entities in a Room database, providing methods for retrieving, inserting, updating, and deleting notes.

classes.name: NoteDao
classes.description: Data Access Object interface for Note entities, defining database operations such as querying, inserting, updating, and deleting notes.

methods.name: getAll
methods.description: Retrieves all notes ordered by their last update time, in descending order.

methods.name: getById
methods.description: Retrieves a note by its unique identifier.

methods.name: insert
methods.description: Inserts a new note with a conflict strategy to replace existing entries.

methods.name: delete
methods.description: Deletes a specified note from the database.
